headline: Barr Sees Path to Legally Add Census Citizenship Question
summary: Attorney General William Barr said he expects to find a legal way to add a citizenship question to the 2020 census, less than a week after the Justice Department said it would drop the attempt in the wake of a Supreme Court decision blocking it.
